attributes.action: Disability discrimination/bullying in schools by teachers
attributes.additional_details:
It is becoming increasingly common children are being belittled and bullied in the classroom by teachers because they have learning disabilities or other 'problems' it's time for action to be taken and for teachers to understand bullying will not be tolerated.

-There needs to be an independent body where a child can go and voice there concerns over how they are being treated by teachers in every school.

-support for the families to know that action is being taken and their child is safe.

-more support for children with higher needs than their peers .
